info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API for rendering HTML and applying a custom extraction function

post.summary: Renders the HTML of a given URL and applies a custom extraction function

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the page to be rendered.

parameters.name: render_js
parameters.description: Whether to execute JavaScript on the page.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: The maximum time allowed for rendering the page.

apiToken.description: The API token used for authentication.

cssSelector.description: The CSS selector used for extracting specific elements.

proxy.description: The proxy server to use for the request.

headers.description: Optional HTTP headers to send with the request.

cookies.description: Optional cookies to send with the request.

screenshot.description: Whether to take a screenshot of the page.

extractorFunction.description: A custom function to extract specific content from the HTML.

jsScenario.description: JavaScript scenario to execute during rendering.

200.description: The rendered HTML and extracted content based on the custom function.

extractedContent.description: Content extracted based on the custom function.
